segments.text: The kitchen has an open window letting in daylight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A woman stands at the sink, holding a plate and towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water flows from the faucet into the basin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's overflowing onto the floor, forming a puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is in the water, but she continues working.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To the left, a boy is on a step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching into an open cabinet for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A girl stands nearby, arm extended toward him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes are stacked on the counter near the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks well-kept with bushes and a path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains are pulled back from the window panes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene captures a typical family moment.
segments.speaker: PAR
